checks.name: launch_config_public_ip_disabled
checks.title: Ensure that any autoscaling launch configuration does not have AssociatePublicIpAddress set to true
checks.risk: Launch configuration contain the template for new EC2 instances, having public settings enabled will cause a security risk such as publicly accessible EC2 instances

detect.manual: Go to AWS EC2 -> Click Autoscaling and Select launch configuration

remediation.text: Update the launch configuration to ensure that the AssociatePublicIpAddress setting is set as disabled
